website_summaries.verdict: A durable folding sideline bench that is sure to serve you well consistently.
pros: Offers ample space for up to 6 people
Steel frame is collapsible for added convenience
Nylon bench is versatile and stylish
Comes in a variety of attractive colors
Sold with a nylon carrying bag for easy transport
cons: Legs sometimes separate from the bench's feet
Can be difficult to secure the nylon cover to the frame

customer_reviews.title: More than promised
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were stunned when we saw the size of this bench in the bag. The bag is easy to carry and not huge. So, we took it out, stretched out the bench and put jaws dropped. He said to me, "Donyou think we will ever get it back in the bag?" We did, with ease! It has been used a few times by a 12U soccer team. Nice to have them off the grass when they aren't in the field. The photo was the first night they had it. We all laughed as almost the whole team piled onto the 6 seats.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt my best purchase for the soccer season. The boys love it. And it looks great. Very durable and not as heavy as I expected. My 11 year old can carry it. As can I along with hauling an entire wagon full! It takes like 2 seconds to stretch out. All the other teams always comment on how great it looks. This blue matches my teams tent and these are so much more comfortable than the standard plastic folding bench. This has withstood an entire season of 5 year old boys. I am certain it will work for next season too! Can’t say enough great things.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: It does take up a lot less room and fits nicely in the carrying bag with a shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: This was the star of our group camping trip! I bought it because I thought it would take up less room in the van than 6 individual chairs. It does take up a lot less room and fits nicely in the carrying bag with a shoulder strap. My family barely got to use it because all of the kids piled onto the "100-person chair" as they called it. Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: The chairs are comfortable and easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time at a tournament. Used it 4 times during the tournament for 7 year old girls. The chairs are comfortable and easy to open and close. The bag appeared to be made of durable material but after reading reviews that the bag does not hold up well, I was very careful with the bag when I was taking the bench in and out. After the 3rd game of the tournament, there was already a small hole in the bag. I even used a wagon to transport the bench. Disappointed with the bag but the bench seems like it will hold up for a little while since the girls are so young.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: This is the one -- don't be sorry you bought a flimsier unit.
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to buy something like this, buy the good one -- this one. I always fight the battle of "should I go cheap?" On an item like this, which will probably end up getting knocked around some, the answer is always "no." This is the quick bench for you. Folds up into an unbelievably small (but heavy) package. The carry bag is very sturdy and won't rip. You can always sell it on craigslist after a few seasons if you're balking at the $100+ price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.text: So we have had this bench since 2014. It has probably been used 9-10 times each season, stored at an even temperature in our garage. The fabric is delaminating and peeling off. Six seasons of use... maybe we should be happy that it’s lasted this long but I find it really annoying that the low quality on the fabric is what is breaking. Would expect better durability. Also it is very heavy- hope you don’t have to carry it very far to the field.
customer_reviews.author: Office Manager Extrordinaire

customer_reviews.title: ... times and I have to say that it's very easy to setup and put back in the bag
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bench several times and I have to say that it's very easy to setup and put back in the bag. One trick is to collapse the bench and leave it standing up while slipping the bag over it. My only wish was for an padded strap. Carrying this thing for long distances can be a little hard on the shoulder since the straps aren't very wide. The team loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Trung C.

customer_reviews.title: Soccer Bench
customer_reviews.text: I spent the extra few dollars on this bench after looking at a couple other 6 seaters. I did this on the advice of a previous reviewer. Good advice. So far after using in the Fall season with U-9 girls it seems to be a quality build. It is easy to carry and has (so far) held up well. Its seems to me that it'll be something that lasts for a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Team has definitely gotten a lot of use out of it so far
customer_reviews.text: Three seasons of U14-U15 soccer so far and it's been great. Has been used in rain and mud as well, and has held up great. I wish it was a bit lighter, but then it might not be a sturdy. The only negative is that the storage/carry bag is not quite durable enough. It's already wearing out and should definitely be built better. Parts of the bag are a heavier duty material, but parts are lighter weight and seem to eventually rip.
customer_reviews.author: Dash V

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TEAM BENCH!!
customer_reviews.text: We have now had this folding bench for 4 years and it has been to well over 100+ club soccer games, and tons of tournaments. The boys are now U18 and same boys have been using it since I got it. In the rain, and blistering hot sun and it’s still in great condition. No problems with it at all!! The boys and our coaches are very thankful for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the best bench that I have bought
customer_reviews.text: By far the best bench that I have bought. I purchased a cheaper brand and the poles went right through the material after 4 soccer games. Once I returned it and received this one I could not believe of well this one was made compared to my previous one. Seats are big enough for adults. And the bag that comes with it was 10 times better than the other one. I would highly recommend this to any team or coach.
customer_reviews.author: GhostRider

customer_reviews.title: Short of five stars because....
customer_reviews.text: ...because of the handle. We've only done a couple of tournaments with this product but it's been great. Only reason I can't give a fifth star is the carry bag. It REALLY does need a shoulder strap! This is HEAVY...and holding it like a briefcase can tend to make the bottom bounce on the ground, (unless you're over 6' tall or have unusually short arms or long torso! :) But the weight is a clue to how sturdy this really is! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a sports bench. If Kwik Goal reads reviews...they'll figure out a way to provide a more useful handle though!
customer_reviews.author: RCP

customer_reviews.title: The bench itself is great. The bag is almost great
customer_reviews.text: The bench itself is great. The bag is almost great. Unfortunately, the top part that cinches is a different material than the rest of the bag and has already started ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Picky1

customer_reviews.title: excellent bench
customer_reviews.text: We've used this one season now for our soccer team. Functionally, this worked great as a team bench. The logistics worked well too with collapsing, using the bag, and transporting it to and from the games. Would be 5 stars if it weren't for the quality mistake with the wrong color bench originally put in the box labeled with the color that I actually ordered. However, they were quick to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henkle

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is fairly light and easy to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a soccer coach for 8 and 9 year old girls. My husband ordered this for my bench. It works great and is fairly light and easy to set up and put away. We’ve also used for our family of 5 at sporting events. The seats are a little narrow for large adults, but it works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: soccerbritt

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for outdoor soccer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our daughter's soccer team. Its held up in all types of weather. The only negative is the storage bag. It's tough to get the bench in and out and it isn't the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Woosley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It was shipped and received very quickly which was fantastic. The first time I used it the girls that I coach loved being able to sit on a bench instead of the ground! It feels very sturdy and it is quite comfortable to sit on. The carry case was very nice making the bench easy to carry from the car, to the field, and back again. Getting it set up couldn't be easier either. All it took were a few seconds and it was all ready to be used. I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone looking for an easy portable bench.
customer_reviews.author: Skeitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best benches and any little league coach needs one! For the little kids who are waiting on the side it gives them a nice seat. One of the easiest benches to put away also! You push the 2 ends together, put it in the bag and you're all set! Fabric hasn't ripped yet either! It may be on the pricy side but holds up better than the cheaper ones definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Justina L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: We use these all the time. Great for our family at the beach. Easy to transport. No sun fading, and have had for over a year. Comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen moeller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy! This has been fantastic for a team of 9 year old boy soccer players! Only gripe would be that I wish the carry bag was as sturdy as the chairs. After a few uses, it has a number of snags/tears from the edges of the chairs poking through while being carried. Wish the material was reinforced better.
customer_reviews.author: KCebb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a soccer team
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a bench for our U11G soccer team. So far it has held up well and provides a great place for the girls to relax while keeping interested in the game. I was a little worried because some of the other reviews said the seams were ripped or the caps came off of the poles but after 6 months, I have not experienced any of that! I do wish it came with a backpack-style carrying bag because the duffle bag-style handles is a little awkward because it doesn't distribute the weight evenly. But, that doesn't impact how well the bench has held up for our team!
customer_reviews.author: PryncesPhD

customer_reviews.title: Nice and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The Kwik Bench is worth buying. The price for the bench is reasonable.We use it for our tennis team and we are looking forward to purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: Elia37

customer_reviews.title: 4th year and still holding up
customer_reviews.text: We're on our 4th year of travel soccer with these and still no tears, no issues. We use them for family functions also.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: The ages are from 4 to 12 and all the kids loved having benches
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for a youth soccer league (and 3 more of another color). The ages are from 4 to 12 and all the kids loved having benches. After 77 total games in the season they were still like new. My officials carry them from the equipment shed, set them up for the morning, bag them up when the games are over and return them to the shed. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: iix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair. My husband coaches soccer team and officiates ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair. My husband coaches soccer team and officiates swim and saw this from another team so he asked if I can purchase this from Amazon. It's sturdy, seats 6-7 middle schoolers. Carrying case makes it easy to travel with. He has been using it every weekend and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: ishop4home

customer_reviews.title: Transports nicely
customer_reviews.text: This bench seat is easy to transport in a bag and fits nicely in our trunk. This bench has lasted through a couple seasons of soccer for my 7 year old and still looks nice. We have played a couple games in the rain and mud and were able to take the bench home and hose it off with water to get it looking band new. The seat is not hard to expand and collapse. I have been able to do it at several games with one hand while holding my infant in the other. You may need 2 hands to fit it back in the bag to store, but it expands and collapses pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for youth sports
customer_reviews.text: Soccer fields don't usually have benches like baseball fields. This is a perfect solution. Compact and easy to transport. It is slightly heavy (my 8 year old can't carry it), but it's supporting 6 people so I'd be more concerned if it was too light weight. This is slightly more expensive that others, but it is a good quality product. The parents on our team were happy to pitch in a few dollars to cover the cost so the kids don't have to sit on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: jenhad

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her soccer teammates LOVE this bench! Much better quality than the last one I bought. The plastic caps on the top of each upright on the benches back are a GREAT addition for durability!
customer_reviews.author: JEFF POLAND

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I read tons of reviews on folding benches prior to purchase, and decided to spend the extra money for a quality product, and I have not been disappointed. It has lasted through a soccer season and camping trips and still as good as new. So glad I bought this one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my 7yr olds soccer team and then a second for my 11yr year olds team. It is easy to store, carry (light), setup, put away and it is very durable and comfortable. It seems to be a bit pricier than others that I have seen but it is a way better value!! It is solid construction and material that will last and provide you with comfortable, functional, reliable, seating. It is great for kids but still large enough for normal sized adults. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gina G

customer_reviews.title: Everybody thinks it is so cool and it is very functional because I can put ...
customer_reviews.text: My family was hosting bible studies and we needed extra seating. We have used this already three times since we've gotten it. Everybody thinks it is so cool and it is very functional because I can put it up in the garage whenever we don't need it. Our other option was a bench but they were all too expensive and not big enough for us. This is not just for soccer teams it can be used for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Laneshia Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy and good quality. We use it for our son's soccer team.
customer_reviews.author: Ana-Zahra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have now used this bench for 1 U6 soccer season and it is still in like new condition. It is high quality construction. It is no problem setting it up and putting it back in its case all by myself. I manage carrying it every week but it is a bit heavy and the strap to the carrying case does not have padding so it can be troublesome carrying it across multiple fields. That said, the bench is high quality, can sit adults as well as kids, and worth being on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: VO2Power

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bench
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the coach for my 10 year old daughter's soccer team. He and the girls love this bench. It is sturdy and has worked well as bench for adults and children alike. The girls won the championship this year - can't rule out that the bench was responsible!!
customer_reviews.author: Simplify23

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously compact
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this product. I gave it to my husband for his birthday because he coaches an IM team of boys for soccer. I noticed that when the kids were all sitting on the grass they were not paying attention to the game. The were running around and not together watching their teammates. This product helped contain these boys and kept them all together. This product is very durable and folds up so small it is amazing! I definately suggest getting the bench with the backs on it, they can throw their jackets over it and they don't fall off as I have noticed with other benches. This was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for any outdoor sports' teams
customer_reviews.text: This product is packaged for easy set-up and break-down after our high school Cross Country meets. I have a team of 40 runners...so we set up a tent/ tarp and then these multi-chair systems at our away meets. It works perfectly and the runners use them constantly....great product and was shipped within a timely manner from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cross Country/ Swim Coach

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Coach High School aged players and it is perfect size and durable. Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my club soccer team. Does the job fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the used version.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a " Used - Very Good" version of this chair. It came to us broken. One of the seat bolts was clearly missing as someone tried to remedy the problem with a zip tie.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Holden

customer_reviews.title: Great service !
customer_reviews.text: Our soccer coach had his stolen so I got this one for our team. Great timing and reasonable! RECOMMEND it for any team
customer_reviews.author: L. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Really great portable bench
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful and useful for soccer games for 8 and 9 year olds. The kids love it and the coaches enjoy keeping the kids contained. I also use it in my home child care and the kids love sitting next to one another. It is very sturdy and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its heavy
customer_reviews.text: i like it but there is not much out there to choose from. i coach a girl's futsal and beach soccer team. pros: it is sturdy and has a professional look. it keeps the players organized and in one place. easy to fold open and close. it comes with a traveling bag. cons: its a bit heavy, appoint one of the parents as "bench duty". i would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: tonybrah 34

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it is a little heavy is important to the quality of this item. The heavy frame allows for more durability and can hold more. The back rest was superb, especially in these chilly few weeks to block the wind. I totally love this bench and believe it will last through my remaining 4 soccer players. The carrying bag that comes with it is well constructed and reinforced. It took a couple times of unfolding it for it to fold all the way out, but it works perfect now!
customer_reviews.author: Jagger Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Great bench seat, bad carry bag
customer_reviews.text: The Bench seat itself was well worth the money spent. We got this for our son's U6 soccer team and since we got it we have not had as much playing around on the sidelines during the game. It has really helped to corral the kids into sitting down and watching the game. I would like to give this product 5 stars, but due to the bag tearing after the 1st use, I cannot. The bench itself seems to be holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: AShields

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat! Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This chair has been fantastic. It's durable and the kids love it. It makes keeping the kids organized and paying attention much easiser during a game or practice when they have a place to sit. This allows the coach to bring his own gear and not depend on parents to remember to bring seats for the kids. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it can't be beat. Only used 10 times this season, but durable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: tombrom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the Kwik Goal customer service dept
customer_reviews.text: Buttons that secure the fabric to the seat frame are already broken after just one season of use. I did request another pack of buttons from the manufacturer and received the wrong ones. Followed up a second and third time with no response. Disappointed with the Kwik Goal customer service dept. Will be using another company this spring for a replacement bench and other soccer training gear.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Horner

customer_reviews.title: Great for all sports and all seasons.  Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Awesome Awesome. All the parents love the fact that their children don't have to sit on the wet cold ground anymore at the fall soccer games. We have also used it for the indoor basketball games for when we play at a gym with no seating for the parents or the players. It stays in our car during any and all sports seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Devine

customer_reviews.title: This was hands down - the BEST sports purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: This was hands down - the BEST sports purchase I have ever made!!! I ordered the bench on a Saturday afternoon while I watched my sons soccer team sit on their own soccer balls as seats. The bench arrived 2 days later on Monday....I have no idea how they processed the order over the weekend - but I LOVE it! I now keep it in the back of my car and have it for every team sport my kids play (soccer, lacrosse, football) it's fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: tracye

customer_reviews.title: Great for young soccer players!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping our soccer players off the ground when they are on the sidelines. Love this. My only regret is that we didn't have it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for the price.  Easy Fold and Set-up!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great for when you arrive at an opponent's field to find nothing for your team to sit on. The bench unfolds easily with one person, although two makes it slightly easier. Likewise with packing it up, can be done alone, but better with a helper. Nice blue carrying case. Relatively lightweight. The team loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Girard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel bench
customer_reviews.text: Awesome travel bench! We bought this because my husband coaches my son's basketball team and they needed to sit on something other than the floor. It's a breeze to set up and packs up nicely in a nylon bag. My son can even nap on it lengthwise. Never knew these existed and I'm very happy with the purchase. The chairs don't look into place, but once you pull it out accordion style it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ho

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids soccer team. There was a missing screw on one of the attachments when we opened it. Not a huge deal and didn't want to deal with returning it. After a season it is starting to come apart in various places. Not a durable seat but it will do the job for a season or two then to the land fill.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soccer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my soccer team. Easy to carry around and even the young kids can put it up or take it down and put it in the carrying bag. Had it for the spring season and its in great condition so far. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed by unicorn tears

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to set up and collapse
customer_reviews.text: I coach youth soccer and purchased two of these. They are easy to set up and collapse, and the kids love it. They only negative is the carrier that came apart at the seam after some time. I can still use the carrier, but if they could make a more durable material that would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark King

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my U10 girl's soccer team which consists of 12 girls. Believe it or not 8 of them fit on it if needed! It's proven to be extremely durable and I'm so glad I paid a little bit more to get this particular bench.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great portable bench for tykes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable bench for the sideline for youth sports teams. I know it came in very handy during the soccer season.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Great for family parties and sports events!!!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this folding bench! Great for family parties and sports events. Now I don't have to lug around all these folding individual chairs. Yes, it does come with a carrying case w/strap.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWoman

customer_reviews.title: It has been used for 10 games over a two month period and is still as good as the day I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 5th and 6th grade team for about $100. It has been used for 10 games over a two month period and is still as good as the day I bought it. It holds 6 players and can take the weight of an adult (I don't know how long it would last if it was full of 6 adults though). It folds up nice and is easy to carry once in the carrying bag that it comes with. I just put it over my shoulder and can transport another big bag of soccer balls as I carry it with me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim kiywt

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry and the kids love it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is durable, easy to carry and the kids love it for the games. We have 10 girls on a travel soccer team, they love this. Carrying case is very durable. Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel teams & for parents coming to watch!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these and love them! One is used by our travel soccer team and the other by the parents coming to watching. It's so much more comfortable to carry and fold/unfold than a bunch of individual chairs. Highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Inka3k

customer_reviews.title: Comfort worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a club soccer team for game use!! Has been great so far. Purchased because of the reinforced stitching by the back support poles, hopefully this will last longer than others I have gotten. So far it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Envy of the field
customer_reviews.text: We were the envy of the soccer fields with this gem. It is so small when it collapses down! When you take it out of the carrying case, the seat unfolds to 6 seats with just one person. I didn't need to enlist anyone's help to carry or unfold. (While pushing a stroller and holding hands with a toddler!)
customer_reviews.author: KTMarcie

customer_reviews.title: Great team bench
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's U9 soccer team. Works great for keeping the players focused and watching the game while on the sideline. Pretty sturdy and good quality; should last for several years. It can be a pain trying to get the bench into the bag with one person given how heavy and awkward it is, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! It is great for sports tournaments. We have two. A great way to gather the team between games. They boys really love these benches. They have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: 3RowerMom

customer_reviews.title: Good for team sideline
customer_reviews.text: Bench works well for team. Wish the storage bags held up better.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Peasley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SEATING
customer_reviews.text: Waited a month after buying to rate. Works great! Have a U9 girls using bench and YES no problem holding weight of two coaches also. Holding up great and kids like to have a place to sit and take a break! Bag and Bench have moved a lot to different fields and product lasts. Can lays down in back of SUV or car trunk. Easy to remove and put out. Able to do by self or 2 of the girls can do it. Easy to fold up, however may need a little getting into bag,
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Carl

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, easy to carry -- kids LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: We are the envy of the soccer complex when we whip this baby out on the sideline. I help coach 9 year old boys, and EACH ONE thanked me for bringing the bench - -even though I had to remind them that all their parents chipped in. But that kind of gratitude from boys that age is definitely saying something. The back support makes this super comfortable and totally worth the extra cost. And this was the best price I found. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: McLok

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a team of 11 year old soccer players. Stood up to the test of time all season.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a bench for game days - works great, has been tough
customer_reviews.text: 3rd grade football team uses this as a bench for game days - works great, has been tough.. used for 1 season, and it worked great. it's in perfect shape heading into season 2
customer_reviews.author: derickav

customer_reviews.title: So far very good
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and built to last The third one we got first two were a different brand and didn’t last through three games this one is the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these benches, a little heavy but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Lori K. Nakamoto

customer_reviews.title: As easy as an umbrella. Great product. Worth the $.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice compact folding bench that slides easily into the bag provided. As easy to open up as an umbrella. Good support and comfort for my boys team. Roomy and keeps them sitting on the sideline rather than goofing off kicking a ball or wandering away to the woods or something.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: It has been great so far - easy to unpack
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bench for our U9 boys team. It has been great so far - easy to unpack, set up and put away. Parents have even used it, when the boys aren't, in between games during long tournament weekends. Definitely worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Comfy bench with a back.
customer_reviews.text: We just go this but right now the team is loving it. We had another bench it lasted a long time, about 5 years before it ripped. We have about 6 boys U15 who use this bench every weekend. They were thrilled to have a bench with a back. I can update this review once we've used it a bunch. Right now a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great for our soccer team
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and gives me a good workout(heavy). Easy to setup. We use it for the kids soccer team and they seem to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vamsi V.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not bad but very small for adult butts. this is maily for small children
customer_reviews.author: gladiator

customer_reviews.title: This couldn't be simpler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old girls soccer team and it has been perfect. The case is easy to put back on and carry it around and isn't all that heavy really. We love it! The red is a plus because a lot of people have the black one so its easy to make sure I get mine back.
customer_reviews.author: sduffy

customer_reviews.title: Great for team, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this for my U9 soccer team. Very sturdy, can set up alone, need a little help getting it back into the bag. The bench is heavy, but does have a shoulder strap that helps. The team loves it, it has been through mud and rain already and is easy to clean and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Whoa
customer_reviews.text: It's great, and works just like advertised, but it is crazy heavy
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. High quality. our soccer team no longer has to rely on blankets on the ground. Gives the kids a dry place to sit, and is very sturdy. Excellent bench!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench for Kids' Teams
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my daughter's soccer team last year. It has held up well. I just purchased a second for my son's soccer team. Nice to have the six seats. The red is a great color. Easy for one parent to unpack and set up. Little kids can do it too.
customer_reviews.author: Carnie Family

customer_reviews.title: Sports Seating
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bench for our child's soccer team. It has a quick and easy setup. So far it's lasted one soccer season, but is still in great condition. I would have given it 5 stars except it's a little heavy and the strap is uncomfortable and hurts my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soccer team
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kid's soccer games for the team to sit on. Wasn't sure how well it would hold up to 11 year old kids. Been bullet proof for this season of competitive soccer. Built well, a bit on the heavy side, but would not sacrifice weight for quality build. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meeeee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality and not too heavy compared to others I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Patience

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! So comfy. High quality. Honestly it helps the kids behave during downtime at and between games. By having the back on it the kids are more likely to leave their water bottles & sweatshirts in place.
customer_reviews.author: JaksMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bench
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping for a bench for soccer for quite some time after our first one bit the dust. I was looking to spend under $100 and managed to get this one with free shipping thanks to Amazon Prime. Arrived quickly and was just what we were looking for. Seems to be good quality- hasn't been used on the field yet, but we have all tried it out at home and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sportsmommy52

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bench
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's club soccer team. It is very good quality folds up into a nice travel bag and easily fits in the trunk. Sets up in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed that it's disintegrated - the seats are literally ...
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed that it's disintegrated - the seats are literally falling apart after being in the garage between seasons (less than a year in the garage). Loved it while we used it last season but that's a pretty big investment for something that only lasted one season of soccer...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great. We bought it for my daughter's soccer team
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We bought it for my daughter's soccer team. She's seven. The players on the sidelines used to play around and not focus too much on the game. Now they cheer their teammates on!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L Heim

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time. We've used at a soccer tournament with 8-9 year olds and at a game with 6 year olds. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Crees

customer_reviews.title: This is the third bench we have purchased. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third bench we have purchased. It really should have been the one and only because the construction and reinforcement on this bench is top quality. The first two benches were different brands and both lasted less than a full season for a team of 7 year old girls.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my U9 girls and one for my U14 boys soccer teams. Initial concern was if it could hold the weight of some of my boys, and it does no problem. One of the dads was even sitting on it, still no problem. Looks to be a very solid product.
customer_reviews.author: RDox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our team of girls
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have only used this twice for my U14 girls team but they are very happy to have a place to sit. It's not too heavy for me to carry and stores nicely in the bag. Super easy 2 hand set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for all the kids on the sidelines. Easy to put away and set up!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great - a must have for all the soccer coaches out there!
customer_reviews.text: My husband coaches many soccer games for my 2 kids, both fall and spring, and we love this bench! Keeps the kids off the wet grass in the mornings, and out of the mud during rainy games. Just like a big camping chair, and easily fits 6 people...coaches too!! Highly recommend! Amazon's price was fantastic when we bought, too!
customer_reviews.author: IowaMom

customer_reviews.title: Has held up great this year with two teams
customer_reviews.text: Has held up great this year with two teams. I can tell it is built to last, not flimsy at all. I have recommended this to other coaches who have asked me about it and have seen a few of them on the sidelines this year. Very easy to get back in the carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Portable bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is great. Fairly light for including the back rest and it is strong and sturdy. It also has a great protective, water resistant bag with a strong and pretty comfortable shoulder strap which makes carrying it to the field easy. It sets up and closes so easy, accordion style, with little effort. I have had two 6-seaters, without the backrest, for two other teams for 4years and they are still going strong and still easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Good Advice

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Wish it had more chairs so entire ...
customer_reviews.text: Got for son's soccer team! Other teams are envious! Great deal. Wish it had more chairs so entire team could fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aiken buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sports team travel bench.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these now for sports teams. They fold up easily, not too heavy and fit in the great bag they come in. I will for sure purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JGLS

product_meta.title: Kwik Goal 6-Seat Kwik Bench
product_meta.description: Kwik Goal 6-seat Kwik Bench. 18"W seats with 16"H seat backs, 108" total width. Connected nylon seats with collapsible steel frame. Black nylon carry bag included. Perfect for tournaments and temporary team seating.
feature_bullets: Convenient, cleverly designed product creates six-person sideline bench
Collapsible steel frame with durable black nylon material
Six 17.5-inch wide seats with 16-inch high seat backs; 26-pound weight
Vertical support poles provide added stability; black nylon carrying bag includ
